member.name: T:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder
member.summary: Defines a custom culture that is new or based on another culture and country/region. The custom culture can be installed on a computer and subsequently used by any application running on that computer. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: M:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.#ctor(System.String,System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionModifiers)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: One of the values that specifies whether the new object is a neutral culture, replaces an existing culture and country/region, or is a new culture.
member.exception: is null.

is the empty string ("").-or- contains characters other than "0" through "9", "a" through "z", "A" through "Z", hyphen (-), or underscore (_).-or- contains hyphens (-) to delimit components, but one or more of the , , , or components is absent. That is, two or more hyphens are adjacent.-or- is longer than 84 characters.-or- contains hyphens to delimit components, but one or more of the components is longer than 8 characters.-or- contains a leading or trailing hyphen (-) or underscore (_).-or- specifies an alternate sort replacement culture instead of a .NET Framework culture. For example, is "de-de_phoneb", a culture that sorts strings as they appear in a German telephone book, instead of "de-DE", the German (Germany) culture.-or- contains an invalid combination of values.-or- contains or and specifies a culture that is not found.-or- contains and specifies a user-created custom culture that does not replace a culture shipped with the .NET Framework.-or- contains and specifies a culture that is not a neutral culture.-or- contains and specifies a user-created custom culture that replaces a specific culture shipped with the .NET Framework.

member.name: P:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.AvailableCalendars
member.summary: Gets or sets an array of calendars that are supported by this object.
member.returns: An array of calendars.
member.exception: In a set operation, the assigned array is null, or an element of the assigned array is null.
This property is not supported for neutral cultures.-or-In a set operation, the assigned array contains , , , , , or .

member.name: P:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.CompareInfo
member.summary: Gets or sets the object that defines how to compare strings for the culture.
member.returns: The object that defines how to compare strings for the culture.
member.exception: In a set operation the assigned value is null.
This custom culture is an override of a built-in culture.

member.name: P:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.ConsoleFallbackUICulture
member.summary: Gets or sets an alternate user interface culture suitable for console applications when the default graphic user interface culture is inappropriate.
member.returns: An alternate culture that is used to read and display text on the console.
member.exception: In a set operation where the specified culture is not null, the property of the specified culture is not the same as the specified culture.

member.name: M:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.CreateFromLdml(System.String)
member.summary: Reconstitutes a object from a specified XML file that contains a representation of the object.
member.returns: A new object that is equivalent to the information stored in the parameter.
member.param: A file name that contains the XML representation of a object.
member.exception: is null.
is an empty string (""), or invalid file or path name.
The data in is not in valid XML format.-or-An I/O error occurred while accessing .
The data in is not in valid LDML format.

member.name: P:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.CultureEnglishName
member.summary: Gets or sets the culture name in English.
member.returns: The culture name in English.
member.exception: The value in a set operation is null.
The length of the value in a set operation does not range from 0 to 79 characters.

member.name: P:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.CultureName
member.summary: Gets the name of the culture being created.
member.returns: The culture name of the current object.

member.name: P:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.CultureNativeName
member.summary: Gets or sets the culture name in the format and language that the culture is set to display.
member.returns: The culture name in the format and language that the culture is set to display.
member.exception: The value in a set operation is null.
The length of the value in a set operation does not range from 0 to 79 characters.

member.name: P:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.CultureTypes
member.summary: Gets the value that describes the culture represented by the current object.
member.returns: One of the values.

member.name: P:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.CurrencyEnglishName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name, in English, of the currency used in the country/region represented by the current object.
member.returns: The name, in English, of the currency used in the region.
member.exception: The value in a set operation is null.
The value in a set operation is the empty string ("").
The current object is a neutral culture.

member.name: P:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.CurrencyNativeName
member.summary: Gets or sets the native name of the currency used in the country/region represented by the current object.
member.returns: The name of the currency used in the country/region represented by the current object, formatted in the language associated with the ISO 3166 country/region code of the region.
member.exception: The value in a set operation is null.
The value in a set operation is the empty string ("").
The current object is a neutral culture.

member.name: P:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.GeoId
member.summary: Gets or sets a unique identification number for a geographical region, country, city, or location.
member.returns: A 32-bit signed number that uniquely identifies a geographical location.
member.exception: The current object defines a neutral culture.

member.name: P:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.GregorianDateTimeFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets a object that defines the format of dates and times according to the Gregorian calendar.
member.returns: A object.
member.exception: The value in a set operation is null.
A property of the value in a set operation returned an invalid property value.
The current object is a neutral culture.

member.name: P:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.IetfLanguageTag
member.summary: Gets or sets a culture name formatted according to the RFC 4646 standard, "Tags for the Identification of Languages."
member.returns: A culture name formatted according to RFC 4646.
member.exception: In a set operation, the value is null.
In a set operation, the length of the value is not from 1 through 84 characters.

In a set operation, a component of the name specified in the value is empty or longer than 8 characters, not an alphanumeric character or hyphen (-), or the name contains a leading or trailing hyphen.

member.name: P:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.IsMetric
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the country/region uses the metric system for measurements.
member.returns: true if the country/region uses the metric system for measurements; otherwise, false.
member.exception: This operation is not valid for a neutral culture.

member.name: P:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.ISOCurrencySymbol
member.summary: Gets or sets the three-character ISO 4217 currency symbol associated with the country/region.
member.returns: The three-character ISO 4217 currency symbol associated with the country/region.
member.exception: This is a neutral culture.
In a set operation, the value is null.
In a set operation, the value is not from 0 through 8 characters long.

member.name: P:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.IsRightToLeft
member.summary: Gets or sets the predominant direction of lines of text in the writing system associated with the current object.
member.returns: true if the predominant direction of lines of text in the current writing system is right-to-left; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.KeyboardLayoutId
member.summary: Gets or sets the active input locale identifier.
member.returns: A 32-bit signed number that specifies an input locale identifier.
member.exception: In a set operation, the value is zero.

member.name: P:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.LCID
member.summary: Gets the culture identifier for the current object.
member.returns: The culture identifier for the current object.

member.name: M:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.LoadDataFromCultureInfo(System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Sets the properties of the current object with the corresponding properties of the specified object.
member.exception: is null.

member.name: M:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.LoadDataFromRegionInfo(System.Globalization.RegionInfo)
member.summary: Sets the properties of the current object with the corresponding properties of the specified object.
member.exception: is null.
Country/region information cannot be set because the current object specifies a neutral culture.

member.name: P:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.NumberFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets a object that defines the culturally appropriate format of displaying numbers, currency, and percentage.
member.returns: A object that defines the culturally appropriate format of displaying numbers, currency, and percentage.
member.exception: The value in a set operation is null.
This operation is not valid for a neutral culture.
The specification for a number, currency, or percent property for this culture contains too many digits or is out of range.

member.name: P:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.Parent
member.summary: Gets or sets the object that represents the parent culture of the current custom culture.
member.returns: The object that represents the parent culture of the current custom culture.
member.exception: In a set operation, the culture value cannot be found. Possibly, the assigned value is an unregistered custom culture.
In a set operation, the value is null.

In a set operation, which traverses the ancestors of the current culture, the invariant culture cannot be found within 10 generations of ancestors. -or- In a set operation, a circular reference was discovered: the assigned value is an ancestor of the current custom culture.

member.name: P:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.RegionEnglishName
member.summary: Gets or sets the full name of the country/region in English.
member.returns: The full name of the country/region in English.
member.exception: This operation is not valid for a neutral culture.
The value in a set operation is null.
The length of the value in a set operation does not range from 0 to 79 characters.

member.name: P:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.RegionName
member.summary: Gets the name of the country/region for the current object.
member.returns: The name of the country/region for the current object.
member.exception: This operation is not valid for a neutral culture.

member.name: P:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.RegionNativeName
member.summary: Gets or sets the full name of the country/region as known by the people of this custom culture.
member.returns: The local name of the country/region.
member.exception: This operation is not valid for a neutral culture.
The value in a set operation is null.
The length of the value in a set operation does not range from 1 to 79 characters.

member.name: M:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.Register
member.summary: Persists the current object as a custom culture on the local computer and makes that culture available to applications. Requires administrative privileges.
member.exception: The custom culture is already registered.-or-The current object has a property that must be set before the culture can be registered. All cultures, neutral or specific, must have and set. Specific cultures must also have , , and set.This method also throws if the following properties are not defined:
A object property value exceeds its maximum length or value.
User does not have administrative privileges.

member.name: M:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.Save(System.String)
member.summary: Writes an XML representation of the current object to the specified file.
member.param: The name of a file to contain the XML representation of this custom culture.
member.exception: is null.
is an empty string ("").
The value of a property of a , , or object contained in the current object is invalid.

member.name: P:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.TextInfo
member.summary: Gets or sets the object that defines the writing system associated with this custom culture.
member.returns: The object that defines the writing system associated with this custom culture.
member.exception: This operation is not supported for replacement cultures.
The value in a set operation is null.
The number of characters in a list separator does not range from 0 to 3 characters.

member.name: P:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.ThreeLetterISOLanguageName
member.summary: Gets or sets the ISO 639-2 three-letter code for the language of this custom culture.
member.returns: The ISO 639-2 three-letter code for the language of the current object.
member.exception: The value in a set operation is null.
The length of the value in a set operation does not range from 1 to 8 characters.
The value in a set operation contains a character that is not in the range "a" to "z", "A" to "Z", or "0" to "9".

member.name: P:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.ThreeLetterISORegionName
member.summary: Gets or sets the three-letter code defined in ISO 3166 for the country/region.
member.returns: The three-letter code defined in ISO 3166 for the country/region.
member.exception: The value in a set operation is null.
The length of the value in a set operation does not range from 1 to 8 characters.
The value in a set operation contains a character that is not in the range "a" to "z", "A" to "Z", or "0" to "9".

member.name: P:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.ThreeLetterWindowsLanguageName
member.summary: Gets or sets the three-letter code for the language as defined in the Windows API.
member.returns: The three-letter code for the language as defined in the Windows API.
member.exception: The value in a set operation is null.
The length of the value in a set operation does not range from 1 to 8 characters.
The value in a set operation contains a character that is not in the range "a" to "z", "A" to "Z", or "0" to "9".
In a set operation, the current custom culture is a replacement culture.

member.name: P:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.ThreeLetterWindowsRegionName
member.summary: Gets or sets the three-letter code assigned by Windows to the country/region represented by the current custom culture.
member.returns: The three-letter code assigned by Windows to the country/region represented by this object.
member.exception: The value in a set operation is null.
The length of the value in a set operation does not range from 1 to 8 characters.
The value in a set operation contains a character that is not in the range "a" to "z", "A" to "Z", or "0" to "9".
In a set operation, the current custom culture is a replacement culture or a neutral culture.

member.name: P:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.TwoLetterISOLanguageName
member.summary: Gets or sets the ISO 639-1 two-letter code for the language of the current object.
member.returns: The ISO 639-1 two-letter code for the language of the current object.
member.exception: The value in a set operation is null.
The length of the value in a set operation does not range from 1 to 8 characters.
The value in a set operation contains a character that is not in the range "a" to "z", "A" to "Z", or "0" to "9".

member.name: P:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.TwoLetterISORegionName
member.summary: Gets or sets the two-letter code defined in ISO 3166 for the country/region.
member.returns: The two-letter code defined in ISO 3166 for the country/region.
member.exception: The value in a set operation is null.
The length of the value in a set operation does not range from 1 to 8 characters.
The value in a set operation contains a character that is not in the range "a" to "z", "A" to "Z", or "0" to "9".
In a set operation, the current custom culture is a neutral culture.

member.name: M:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder.Unregister(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes a custom culture from the local computer.
member.param: The name of a custom culture.
member.exception: is a parent culture or console fallback user interface culture of a dependent culture.
Application does not have administrative privileges.
specifies a culture that is not found.

member.name: T:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionModifiers
member.summary: Specifies constants that define a object.

member.name: F:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionModifiers.None
member.summary: A specific, supplemental custom culture.

member.name: F:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionModifiers.Neutral
member.summary: A neutral custom culture.

member.name: F:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionModifiers.Replacement
member.summary: A custom culture that replaces an existing .NET Framework culture or Windows locale.
